name: perf-tpl
description: High-performance web application template with Vite, React, WebAssembly, Workers, and Node.js backend

scripts.build: pnpm run build:client && pnpm run build:server
scripts.build:wasm: cd client/src/wasm && cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && wasm-bindgen target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/*.wasm --out-dir ../../../public/wasm --target web
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:client && pnpm run lint:server
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd client && pnpm install && cd ../server && pnpm install
